price: 6. Ir kame yra grožis jums, kai jūs parvedate juos namo vakare ir kai jūs genate juos ganytis ryte.
arabic: وَلَكُمۡ فِيهَا جَمَالٌ حِينَ تُرِيحُونَ وَحِينَ تَسۡرَحُونَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walakum fīhā jamālun ḥīna turīḥūna waḥīna tasraḥūna
